content.rendered:
Urban3 is a research and design studio based in Greece founded in 2009 by architects and urban designers. The studio undertakes projects that range from large scale urban design to small scale commercial architectural design projects. Urban3 has collaborated in various projects with universities, nonprofits and other design firms such as the Chair of Architecture and Urban Design at the ETH Zürich, Urban-Think Tank, “School of Architecture for All” and NEAR architecture.

The Team

Lina Liakou

Clelia Thermou

Ioanna Pothou
